data: RESP AMB Adult Cystic Fibrosis MRSA Eradication Protocol (Module)
Medications
Chose two of the oral antibiotics below
SEPTRA DS 800 mg-160 mg tab (dosed as trimethoprim)
2 tab, PO, BID, order duration: 14 day, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 56 tab/cap, refill(s): 0
minocycline 100 mg oral capsule
1 cap, PO, BID, order duration: 14 day, drug form: tab/cap, dispense qty: 28 tab/cap, refill(s): 0
doxycycline hyclate 100 mg oral capsule
1 cap, PO, BID, order duration: 14 day, drug form: tab/cap, dispense qty: 28 tab/cap, refill(s): 0
rifaMPin 300 mg oral capsule
1 cap, PO, BID, order duration: 14 day, drug form: tab/cap, dispense qty: 28 tab/cap, refill(s): 0
mupirocin 2% oint
As directed, topical, BID, apply to both nostrils (with Q-tip), order duration: 14 day, drug form: oint, dispense qty: 1 tube, refill(s): 0
chlorhexidine 2% topical liquid
As directed, topical, qdaily, wash whole body, order duration: 5 day, drug form: bottle, dispense qty: 1 bottle, refill(s): 0
chlorhexidine 0.12% mucous membrane liquid
0.018 g = 15 mL % 15 mL, swish and spit, BID, or as directed, 0/018 g = 15 mL, order duration: 14 day, drug form: bottle, dispense qty: 1, refill(s): 0
Blood Products
To be done on day 21 after treatment initiation
Laboratory
Sputum C&S

Cystic Fibrosis Sputum, Send sample to St. Paul's Hospital Microbiology Lab (Cystic Fibrosis Bench), Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit, SPH Cystic Fibrosis Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Sputum C&S

Cystic Fibrosis Sputum, Send sample to St. Paul's Hospital Microbiology Lab (Cystic Fibrosis Bench), Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit, SPH Cystic Fibrosis Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Sputum C&S

Cystic Fibrosis Sputum, Send sample to St. Paul's Hospital Microbiology Lab (Cystic Fibrosis Bench), Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit, SPH Cystic Fibrosis Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
